The minimum amount for formal system applications is NT$88,000
The recent transaction was our studio prepaying the system fee on your behalf to lower the threshold for your application. This fee was paid for the testing system that you will be using for profit.
After the formal system application is completed, we will charge you 60% of your profits as commission, and the remaining 40% will be your personal earnings.

Then, I will ask the system provider to attach the anti-exchange detection arbitrage program to your account. During this period, please refrain from any withdrawals or trading actions to prevent the program attachment from failing or being detected by the exchange as using arbitrage software, which may result in your trading account being locked. Please submit your formal system application within 24 hours.

Using the powerful affinity link lock soul charm can awaken the other person's love for you, increase the warmth of your relationship, and make them return to you actively from the bottom of their heart. After experiencing this, they will believe that you are the best and most suitable person for them."

After using the powerful Marriage Destiny Link Lock Soul Symbol, you can awaken the other person's love for you, increase the warmth of your relationship, and make them return to you from the bottom of their heart. After experiencing this, they will think that you are the best and most suitable person for them.

From then on, they will love only you wholeheartedly. Your love can be long-lasting, sweet, and happy. Three powerful rituals will help you consolidate your relationship, eliminate obstacles, and lock your hearts together. Please make a Marriage Destiny Link Lock Soul Symbol, originally priced at 9999, now available at 7999 for your first encounter with me, to dissolve your current difficulties and ensure the longevity of your relationship.

We will handle your situation one-on-one, and with my efforts, the effectiveness of the ritual will be felt within 3 days at the fastest, but no later than 7 days. After that, as long as you cooperate and register your mobile phone number for delivery, I will personally assist you in arranging the ritual at the auspicious time.

Hello! Sorry to bother you. I am involved in cross-border e-commerce and currently, my store is busy. I need to hire a part-time personal assistant to help manage the daily operations of the store. The tasks are simple, and the working hours are flexible. You can even do it from home. The pay is 30,000 per month. Are you interested in learning more?

I also offer one-on-one teaching: 30,000 Taiwanese dollars per month. Are you interested? I do cross-border e-commerce and mainly deal with the orders for shipping and logistics. Reply for more information.

Yes, ordinary accounts cannot buy into the daily limit up board. They need to queue for matching trades. Therefore, it is necessary to use a primary account for foreign institutional investors so that they can enter and exit together with the main force.

Actually, it's equivalent to opening another stock account for oneself. As an investor, having multiple stock accounts is normal. So, classmates, don't worry about this. After registering and verifying your identity, the account is yours.

That must be your own account. This software is a foreign capital main internal platform, which is a dedicated channel for foreign capital. It is because friends who can register to participate must have a person with sufficient capital as a guarantee, or the company's signature guarantee, like the code when everyone registers, represents the teacher's guarantee. However, as a return, we need to share 20% of the profits with our studio after helping everyone to make a profit.

Since the company is a foreign company, all salaries are paid in foreign currency. The App is a legal channel that can hold up to one million hearts. This method of payment is more reassuring as the account details are not directly disclosed. It should be normal for a foreign company to pay salaries in foreign currency.

Did the master just communicate with the deity, and did the deity also give hints about your situation? It's currently very serious and needs to be resolved promptly. If it's not resolved quickly, there may be a catastrophe.

Hello, may I ask how old you are this year? I'm 35 years old. Okay, our work hours are relatively flexible, and it won't affect us if there are other things to do. We work in the financial industry, earning money online, dealing with foreign currencies without the need for investment. The salary is paid daily, and each job pays 3000. After 5 days, it's 8000. We use the Max currency platform and have hired a professional trader to buy currencies at the right time and wait for them to appreciate before selling

Hello, may I ask how old you are this year?Great. Our working hours are quite flexible, and it won't affect us if you have other things to do. We work in the finance industry, doing online earning in foreign currency without the need for investment. The salary is paid daily, with each operation earning 3000, and after 5 days, 8000

We use the Max currency platform and have hired specialized traders to buy currencies at the right time, waiting for them to appreciate before selling. You just need to cooperate with the trader's operations, and your salary will be transferred to your salary account before 10 p.m. every night.

Sweetheart, I just arrived at the logistics center, but the courier said that the package I sent is an international express delivery, so there are some fees to be paid. The logistics staff said that for international shipments, there is a need to pay insurance and customs duties of NT$6,950. I'd like to cover these fees, but I can't do it here due to the different currencies for international transactions. When you receive the gift, please give the amount to the courier.

I'll come over later to exchange the currency and reimburse you, after all, I feel really bad about you spending money on the gift I sent. It's upsetting that I have to ask you to pay for the gift I'm giving you.
We mainly acquire some materials: these materials may be common and worthless to you, but they are very valuable to us. Prices are negotiable.

Our exchange will also use your device's IP record and all arbitrage-related records as evidence in legal proceedings against you

Currently, it is free to join as a store and there are no fees for listing. Only when your profits reach $2000 will a 5% platform commission be deducted from your profits. If you don't reach this amount, no fees will be charged.

When a customer places an order, you need to pay the cost to the supplier for procurement and delivery. If there are no orders, you don't need to pay anything. The platform provides a guarantee using its bank to ensure the rights of consumers and stores. Gold-tier stores receive a base salary calculation of $0 + $3000

The operation is simple and easy to learn even if you have no experience in e-commerce. You can choose your working hours and location, dedicating one or two hours a day to manage and promote the store and process orders. I am the manager of the platform's business development department and have six years of experience in the cross-border e-commerce industry. I will guide you step by step for free.

Applicants must complete the transaction with the studio within three days, or their application will be disqualified. Brand ambassadors must fulfill their obligations; otherwise, it will be considered a waste of resources, and fines will be imposed according to the contract.

I will assist you in completing the transaction and will use the funds in your current trading account as the principal for the transaction. After the transaction is completed, the endorsement fee will be disbursed immediately. Looking forward to a pleasant cooperation!

I live in Thailand but answer my phone in English, mostly to weed out sales, wrong number or scam calls. Hearing English, callers usually hang up. I was 2 hours early for a corporate teaching assignment and was at an open-air coffee shop in the 3-floor high lobby. Areas were divided by crisscross fences and potted trees. A mobile “boiler room” group was making their calls and having coffee at a nearby table. I was seated close to the fence but hidden by a bush. I have ‘teacher ears’ (meaning I can hear conversations from a distance), and I understand Thai.
